summary: This is a brief email from a Lieutenant at the Federal Bureau of Prisons, Department of Justice, transmitting daily lieutenant's log files for July 19-22, 2019, in response to a request. The document is marked confidential and originates from the Southern District of New York (SDNY).

persons.name: Lieutenant
persons.context: The sender of the email, a Lieutenant at the Federal Bureau of Prisons, Department of Justice, who is transmitting daily log files.

keyFacts: The document is a confidential email from a Bureau of Prisons Lieutenant dated July 23, 2019.
It transmits four daily 'Lieutenant's Log' files covering the dates July 19-22, 2019.
The logs are being sent in response to a specific request, indicating they are part of an official inquiry or investigation.
The document originates from the Southern District of New York (SDNY), which was handling the Epstein case.
The timing (July 2019) corresponds closely with Jeffrey Epstein's arrest (July 6, 2019) and his subsequent death in custody (August 10, 2019).
